content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 over easy is a stylish and modern boxy sweater perfect for layering over t-shirts tunics and dresses the relaxed shape generous proportions and soft merino/mohair blend yarn make it an easy and comfortable garment for everyday wear the sweater is knit from the bottom up and is intended to be worn with significant ease through the body we found that the second size looks great on individuals ranging in bust size from 36 to 44 see photos however to help you decide on which size to knit we suggest selecting one which provides between 20 and 30 of positive ease you can also opt for a smaller circumference and use the body length indicated for a larger size finished measurements sizes 1 2 3 4 body circumference 64 69 76 76 sleeve length 8 5 8 5 7 5 7 5 length from shoulder to bottom 18 18 21 23 use the following as a general guide for sizing based on bust measurement size 1 28 - 34 size 2 36 - 44 size 3 46 - 52 size 4 52 + yarn loopy mango mohair so soft 47% super kid mohair 53% extra fine merino wool 65 yds 60 m /50 g 5 6 8 9 balls shown in autumn leaves while the body and sleeves of this sweater are easily customized please note that adding length may affect yardage requirements tools * 32 circular needle 15 mm us 19 or size needed to obtain gauge * optional 15 mm double-pointed needles we knit our sleeves using the magic loop method with the 32 needles * stitch marker to indicate beginning of round we used a loop created with waste yarn * tapestry needle to weave in ends
